channel.title: CVE Feed for systemd -- systemd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for systemd -- systemd

item.title: CVE-2018-15687|2024-08-05T10:01:54.407Z -- systemd -- systemd
item.description: A race condition in chown_one() of systemd allows an attacker to cause systemd to set arbitrary permissions on arbitrary files. Affected releases are systemd versions up to and including 239.

item.title: CVE-2018-15686|2024-08-05T10:01:54.314Z -- systemd -- systemd
item.description: A vulnerability in unit_deserialize of systemd allows an attacker to supply arbitrary state across systemd re-execution via NotifyAccess. This can be used to improperly influence systemd execution and possibly lead to root privilege escalation. Affected releases are systemd versions up to and including 239.

item.title: CVE-2018-15688|2024-08-05T10:01:54.435Z -- systemd -- systemd
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the dhcp6 client of systemd allows a malicious dhcp6 server to overwrite heap memory in systemd-networkd. Affected releases are systemd: versions up to and including 239.
